Text: Note that I will not be able to seed this tonight. I will however continue seeding it again in a few hours. That would be about eleven AM, UTC GMT0. Hang in there.

Additional notes:
- File format is .ttf (of course). Thought I should mention that. That means that these fonts will work on Linux systems, older Windows versions (such as Windows XP) and Macs.

- I accidently set bit size of this torrent to 250 kB. Hope it won't cause too much trouble.

Enjoy.
These are good fonts. http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3459189/Microsoft_ClearType_Fonts_(optimized_for_LCDs) also includes Segoe UI.
